title: Exclusive: Ebro In The Morning - Political Roundup ft. Maya Wiley, Ray McGuire, and Carmen Perez
itunes:author: Ebro In The Morning on HOT 97
itunes:summary:
NYC Mayoral Candidates Maya Wiley (0:30) and Ray McGuire (34:05) talk with Ebro, Laura Stylez, and Rosenberg. President & CEO for Gathering for Justice and Founder of Justice League Carmen Perez (1:00:45) comes onto the program to discuss the importance of parole reform. 

Make sure to vote in the June 22nd NYC election and to look into your local races if you are outside of NYC! 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
